output.sentences: Children set the table for dinner.
People began to arrive shortly after the last plate was set, sharply at 7:00 PM.
The guests gathered around the table, filling their plates high with flood, higher than the empire state building.
Gathered around the table, they sat, drank, and ate joyfully.
The conversation never grew dull and they continued conversing well after late afternoon.
